meanings.sent1: The antimalarial medication helped protect the travelers from getting sick.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend taking antimalarial drugs before traveling to malaria-prone areas.
meanings.sent3: The antimalarial pills were like tiny shields against the mosquito-borne disease.
meanings.sent4: Her vigilant use of antimalarial measures was her armor against the threat of malaria.
meanings.sent5: The antimalarial spray created an invisible barrier against the malaria-carrying mosquitoes.

meanings.definition: A drug used to prevent or treat malaria.
meanings.sent1: She packed the antimalarial in her travel kit for the trip to Africa.
meanings.sent2: The clinic provided free antimalarial medication to those at risk of malaria.
meanings.sent3: The antimalarial pills were like tiny superheroes fighting off the malaria parasites.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against malaria, antimalarial drugs are the frontline soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of the antimalarial was evident in the declining malaria cases.
